sentences.sCn: 我们可以在那里吃晚饭。

sentences.sContent: Could you come over and have dinner with my family?
sentences.sContent_eng: Could you come over and have dinner with my family?
sentences.sCn: 你能来和我的家人一起吃晚饭吗？

sentences.sContent: If you want I'll invite my stepsister and her to have dinner with us.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you want I'll invite my stepsister and her to have dinner with us.
sentences.sCn: 如果你愿意的话，我会请我那个姐姐，还有她和我们一起吃晚饭。
